title: 111: Kwik Challenge - Protect Your Gray Matter
description:
Welcome to Kwik Brain Challenge #5!

In this episode, I’ll be explaining how this challenge will help you to protect your gray matter.

The Kwik Challenge is for people who want to create positive change in their lives—to take the knowledge and turn it into power. Change doesn’t have to be difficult. All habit change starts with simple tiny steps, and before you know it you’ll be heading toward a new destination—the little things will add up to something much bigger!

By doing this challenge, you will:

  • Boost your blood-brain barrier
  • Increase resilience
  • Learn to plan your day
  • Have better neurotransmitters
  • And more!

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new challenge in the coming weeks? Go to www.KwikChallenge.com to register and find out how you can participate. **
